print.io.photosource

Interface PhotoSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPhotoSource

    public interface PhotoSource
extends java.io.Serializable
    Photo source interface.
    Author:
    Vlado

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  PhotoSource.AuthorizationCompleteCallback
      Callback interface for PhotoSource authorization completion.

      Returns unique ID of the photo source service.

      • login

        void login(Activity activity,
         PhotoSource.AuthorizationCompleteCallback authorizationCompleteCallback)
        Initiates authorization process to this PhotoSource.
        Parameters:
        activity - The caller activity.
        authorizationCompleteCallback - An authorization completion callback informing caller of authorization status.

      • logout

        void logout(Activity activity)
        Initiates logout process for this PhotoSource.
        Parameters:
        activity - The caller activity.

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized(Context context)
        Returns true if user is authorized to this PhotoSource. If PhotoSource does not require authorization method should return true always.
        Parameters:
        context - The caller activity Context.
        Returns:
        true if user is authorized to this PhotoSource.

      • openConnectionForImageDownload

        java.net.HttpURLConnection openConnectionForImageDownload(Context context,
                                                        java.lang.String url)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Opens connection for downloading photo from this PhotoSource.
        Parameters:
        context - The caller activity Context.
        url - The URL to the photo resource.
        Returns:
        A new connection to the photo resource referred by this URL.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while opening the connection.
